foodTruck.name: Miguel's Sushi
foodTruck.description: Your neighborhood sushi stop customizable rolls, rice or salad bases, and rotating chef specials. Fresh, bright, and deliciously portable.

menuItems.name: Pacific Rainbow Roll
menuItems.description: Fresh salmon, tuna, avocado, cucumber, and pickled carrot rolled and topped with a yuzu-miso drizzle and toasted sesame.

menuItems.name: Salmon Poke Bowl
menuItems.description: Marinated Ōra King salmon over sushi rice with edamame, wakame, pickled ginger, shaved radish, and wasabi-lime ponzu.

menuItems.name: Yuzu Matcha Sparkler
menuItems.description: Lightly sparkling blend of ceremonial matcha, fresh yuzu citrus, and a hint of cane syrup—crisp, refreshing, and balanced for pairing with sushi.

menuItems.name: Takoyaki (6 pcs)
menuItems.description: Osaka-style octopus fritters crispy outside, custardy inside topped with okonomi sauce, Kewpie mayo, bonito flakes, and aonori served with pickled ginger.

menuItems.name: King Torch Salmon Roll
menuItems.description: Crab salad, avocado, and cucumber inside; topped with torched Ōra King salmon, yuzu-soy glaze, tobiko, and chives for a smoky, umami finish.
